Articles.Content:
A launch cinematic of the First Kerbal Weather Satellite (KWS-1)

This is my first KSP cinematic video ever, I know of a few errors that I'm not going to point out, if you see them then congrats, one in particular you need to be paying attention to catch. XD I'll take good and bad feedback happily. I normally just do gamplay videos. (On that note, am I allowed to post Playthrough footage here? I used to when there was a video section but I haven't ever sense the forums imploded cause this section seems more artsy.) Anywho. Tell me what yo think of my first cinematic video.

http://youtu.be/19K3UAjBvCY

(I listed it as special, even tho I dont really think it is, its a video, and thats not one of the prefixs I can use... so... if thats wrong Im sorry.. it doesnt really say anywhere I can find how to list videos. My second choice would have been screenshot and just claimed it was about 6360 of them and some audio...)
